name: Cars Tech Demo
description:
I've always loved Cars Race O Rama. I've wanted to recreate at least a few bits of Race O Rama into a 2D sidescrolling space. Of course, this is wayyy less content than Race O Rama... hell, this one has one race. But I've tried to capture some of the feeling that Race O Rama has. Of course, this doesn't take place in the same world as that game, but because of engine limitations, this is the best I've could've done, worldwise at least.

This game (or prototype) is really just a framework for how my own racing game would feel like. Of course, if you have any ideas for improvements, comment down below.
